text: Wild Strawberries is a 1957 Swedish drama movie directed by Ingmar Bergman and stars Victor Sjöström, Bibi Andersson, Ingrid Thulin, Gunnar Björnstrand, Björn Bjelfvenstam, Max von Sydow. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1960. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ingmar Bergman Category:Movies about dreams
title: Wild Strawberries (movie)
